title: [DEAD] Indiana Jones & the Last Crusade (1989) - Steven Spielber
description:
Disc III - Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989) - /English/+ Subs/ - DvdRip

___________________________


Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
Directed by Steven Spielberg
 
Genre: Adventure

Tagline: The man with the hat is back. And this time, he's bringing his Dad.

Plot Outline: Renowned archeologist and expert in the occult, Dr. Indiana Jones, returns for the 3rd and final Indy film. Teaming up with his father, Indiana sets out to try and find the Holy Grail. Once again, the Nazis are after the same prize, and try to foil Indiana's plans.

___________________________


Modified DVD Rip with DvdShrink; THX Setup bonus feature were removed (useless, we didn't wait for this DVD to setup our sound system...)
The rest is untouched ! 

Disc III of the Indiana Jones "Complete DVD Movie Collection".
